Key Match Events: The Rockets' second-half scoring surge combined with great defense willed a 20-point blowout win.
The Rockets put up 39 points in the third quarter alone, followed by a 30-point fourth quarter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets dominated the glass, grabbing 64 rebounds, 23 of them being offensive boards.
The Grizzlies grabbed just 43 total rebounds.
Alperen Sengun and Jabari Smith Jr. dominated the glass, with Sengun having 15 rebounds and Smith Jr. having 16.
The Rockets' 23 offensive rebounds created more opportunities in the second half.
Others: The game was played at Toyota Center in Houston, Texas.
The Rockets will be on the road in their next game, taking place Monday, Oct. 28 against the San Antonio Spurs.
